summary: Categorized Favorites Menu config for new weapons,armors,spells & etc in the Requiem Oldschool Roleplaying Overhaul by Xarrian.
descriptionHtml:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4862]Categorized Favorites Menu[/url] config for new weapons,armors,spells & etc in [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19281]Requiem - The Oldschool Roleplaying Overhaul[/url]
and some other popular mods.

Based on original config file.
With support of Frostfall, Convenient Horses & Cloaks of Skyrim
Almost all spells are in the list, but if you find anything missing, feel free to add them in the comments, mod will be updated.

Install after Categorized Favorites Menu and overwrite favoritesmenu.cfg.

Minimal resolution is [b]1920x1080[/b].
There are instructions insideÂ favoritesmenu.cfg for changing minimal resolution to 1920x1200


[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4262141/?tb=mods&pUp=1]My other mods[/url]
author: HexPex
